title.rendered: Google Algorithm Updates That Changed SEO

content.rendered: Google’s Ranking System includes the use of multiple advanced algorithms that sort through billions of web pages per second to deliver the most relevant information to users.

excerpt.rendered: Google’s Ranking System includes the use of multiple advanced algorithms that sort through billions of web pages per second to deliver the most relevant information to users.
